title: Music Education Software Development Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational music education theory and understanding of software development processes
context.additional_context: Emphasis on collaborative processes between music teachers and software developers, developing solutions implementable in smartphone-based limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Enhancement of music education software design capabilities based on learner requirements
Development and testing of software prototypes considering educational applicability
Proposal of implementation plans for education-friendly interfaces through teacher-developer collaboration

resources: Mobile-friendly development tools (Thunkable, App Inventor, etc.)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
